website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a challenging, vigorous workout, this is the board for you.
pros: Provides a good core and leg workout along with balance improvement
Can be used on hard floors
cons: It's difficult to use at first

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with a bongo board in my house. It was a boatload of fun and well built. I ordered this POS in the hopes that my kids would have the same experience only to find it is a poorly constructed peice of plywood which is glued, nailed and screwed (you have to screw together) bongo rip off. The bottom track is stapled on so poorly, the plywood wheels will not smoothly roll along the board. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: JPE

customer_reviews.title: A bit rough...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product off and on for a year. It's very cleverly engineered - basically all just cut out of plywood. The roller is just a bunch of thick discs that you screw together with a long bolt. The board itself has a guide rail down the middle that fits in between the discs so that you stay in the middle of the roller, but if you run up against it, the friction really throws you off. Still a good purchase though, definitely worth the money. I'm 230lbs and it supports me just fine.
customer_reviews.author: wesssstexas

customer_reviews.title: Versatility for all to learn
customer_reviews.text: Love the balance improvement for our 12yr old He is into gymnastics and has helped and amused him. He likes to show off his skills. Has even turned into mini competition between his father and I improving our skills as well and they non existent! Lol Be very careful though a couple near miss disasters where diverted by teenage daughter standing by. She is not athletic but we are finding her trying this more and more. It is a great core workout without you really knowing it’s happening. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The roller is not solid like the original models from 30 years ago
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model balance board about 5 years ago and I just bought a second one. They have changed the shape of the board slightly, but other than that it is unchanged from the earlier model. The roller is not solid like the original models from 30 years ago. The new roller is certainly cheaper to produce, but the design works fine. Using this board is a fun and easy way to work on balance skills.
customer_reviews.author: JamesD

customer_reviews.title: Super balancing board, but must learn to use it slowly
customer_reviews.text: I got this after foot surgery to help me greatly improve my ability to balance. This is an advanced product. Works great, but I found that you must learn to use it while holding on to something or having a walking stick. The video makes it so easy and fluid, maybe for kids. It is very easy to fall from it and you have to learn to balance slowly. But, this is the greatest product for advanced balancing exercises. Get it but go very very slowly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Adler

customer_reviews.title: If you're not handy you may get stuck.
customer_reviews.text: Good balance board once put together but I have to give it one star. The bolt provided to assemble the balance wheel was not long enough. I had to drill and recess two of the wheels to assemble everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bukowski

customer_reviews.title: Chintzy!
customer_reviews.text: Like another reviewer, i was hoping for some semblance of the original vintage bongo board quality. Nope, just same poorly-milled pieces of plywood and a bolt. They didn't even install the center track with screws - just staples. The upside is that I realized that even with my limited tools, I'm fully capable of making something better than this on my own.
customer_reviews.author: RocER

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP RIPOFF!!!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up using a Bongo board in the 70's. This item is FAR from the quality of the 70's models. The "roller" isn't a solid roller, just a stack of cheap plywood discs and blocks that need to be bolted together. All of the wood parts are unfinished (clearcoat is inexpensive, guys!), the deck is cheaply glued and stapled together. THIS ITEM IS A CHEAP RIPOFF! I am returning it, and will NEVER buy another Carrom product again!
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed in this
customer_reviews.text: First off let me start by saying this board would receive a 5-star rating but it needs more grip tape where you place you feet. Other than that it was a breeze to put together (the roller comes in separate pieces and the hardware to assemble it, so no worries its simple), well made and strong. If you need something for snowboarding/skateboarding this will work. If you're looking for something that wobbles in a circular motion look elsewhere as this particular balance board only shifts left to right, but that's enough for most beginners to intermediates. You will not be disappointed in this!
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for myself for my 52nd birthday, and I'm realizing I should have been buying & using Carrom Exercise Balance Boards since I was 25... oh well- better late than never~ It's very well made, easy to assemble and easy to take anywhere. and so much fun!! Kids are using this more than their cell phones or video games. I barely get a turn! Thanks Carrom! I love it~
customer_reviews.author: WonderWife

customer_reviews.title: If you were like me, bongo boards in sporting goods stores feature ...
customer_reviews.text: Where is the roller?????? If you were like me, bongo boards in sporting goods stores feature 1 board and 2 a solid roller. The balance board arrived in a flat box which could hold a board. I did not bother opening the box, which could never hold a solid roller. As turns out, the box held a series of discs and separators which go onto a bolt to make the roller.
customer_reviews.author: Fmaxrobs

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is what I think of when I think of balance board. There are other variations on a balance board available on Amazon, but this type is what I think of when I hear balance board. It was simple to put together. I love standing on this thing and watching TV, or torturing my friends with it. The only gripe I have is that the "drum" thing that you roll on slips if you change direction too fast. I fixed that by laying down some electrical tape where the wheels touch the board. No more slippage now. That's the only reason why I put 4 stars, I would definitely suggest getting one otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: GrandaddyFarooq

customer_reviews.title: I really like this its easy to use because it has a ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this its easy to use with the two stoppers. This is a great beginner balance board. I would give it 3 stars is they had provided more round pieces. I ended up making a couple more to fill this out as it was creating a wear pattern in the rug. Now with the added rounds I feel comfortable with it not wearing the carpet out. Update after using it for about 2 years I switched to a skateboard deck and now wish I actually had a solid core all the way through. I would take the center guide off the board since it actually makes it harder to learn and I think is more dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: P. Laidlaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice board, could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Really fun board. The plywood is really nice for the board itself but is an issue for the roller. The center rail of the board rubs against the veneer causing a cringe worthy sound and the veneer to flake off the roller. I remedied the issue with a coat of polyurethane on the roller and bottom of the board. Overall, a well built product for the price but it could use a few improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Young professional

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to keep this long term
customer_reviews.text: Calling it cheaply made is being nice I have no idea how it's so highly rated looks like someone made it in there garage. The least they could do is have a real roller or sand the one they give you. I'll use it till it breaks then buy a real one from a more reputable company.
customer_reviews.author: Dragongear

customer_reviews.title: Best Balance Board
customer_reviews.text: This is about the least expensive balance board of this style that I could find. It is sturdy and well-made. Most importantly, it has stops and a guide-rail that keeps you or the board from flying away. I don't think you can get a better board for three times this price.
customer_reviews.author: Ann H. Harris

customer_reviews.title: This is the best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gift ever! We bought it for one of our daughters for Christmas and everyone (even grandma) has been in love with it! I was hesitant about the "plainness" of it, but it turned out to be the biggest hit at our house! Don't let your first two tries scare you. We all feared cracking our heads open, but got the hang of working on it quickly without ever mastering it. When was the last time you bought something (besides a video game) that your kids didn't conquer before Christmas Day was over?!? It's physical, challenging and addictive!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing. I work up a pretty good sweat while I'm having fun. If you get good you can easily do it while texting, watching tv, playing video games, basically anything. And the best benefits is you get sure on your feet. Balance becomes second nature. This is a fantastic price and I like the guards on the bottom so you don't slip off if you go to far to one side.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: My whole family enjoyed using this product for a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: My whole family enjoyed using this product for a few weeks, until the balance wheel and top board started flaking apart. See the picture of the center wheel and the thinness of the underside of the board, as the center staple is much closer to the edge now. Both show wear. Very disappointed, but like another reviewer said, $50 was a great price. If only young kids, 10U use it, you may not see the wear we did. We are looking for a more durable board.
customer_reviews.author: leen_harmey

customer_reviews.title: ... board many years ago similar to this one and loved it, so I am excited to have found ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a balance board many years ago similar to this one and loved it, so I am excited to have found this one. I have been looking for this type of balance board for many years. The one I had many years ago was homemade and used a solid wood core for the cylinder. I wasn't sure how this "pieced-together" version would work out but it seems to be working fine. I am very happy to have the balance board ...
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Better quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: The balance board's materials are of exceptionally poor quality. The roller unit is compromised of plywood materials that split, flake, and fall apart. The unit is of such poor quality that the roller have developed flattish areas that cause the board's action to be jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: If you buy a bongo board, don't try to save money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a board with a groove. It might be ok if the product was finished. The board squeaks and squawks as you go from side to side and it doesn't run the entire distance of the runner board. I have applied for a refund
customer_reviews.author: skidame

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners or for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this for my husband and he is too good at it! It's for beginners, they have more advanced ones for people who are into fitness. This would be great for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Lousy
customer_reviews.text: Well.... I ordered the board and it arrived without the roller or spindle. I was sent a replacement... no roller or spindle Does not work- So very unhappy picture shows board and spindle or roller. Useless
customer_reviews.author: lynnette

customer_reviews.title: so it's gotta be boring, right
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't think our teen boy would be too fazed by this, it's not a video game, so it's gotta be boring, right? Well, I was wrong, pleasantly so. He's on this thing daily! He hopes that someday we can get a fancier one. He loves that he's working out his core & improving his balance. I want to get one for myself now! I would definitely recommend this to anyone that skateboards, snowboards or surfs. It's a fun way to work out your core without 'working out' because its like playing. We will be looking into other versions for sure.
customer_reviews.author: MoonBeachbum

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: Followed the advice of a couple of reviewers above: sand rough edges on wheels and spacers. In no time at all they were ready to go. So happy I got two of these instead of one of the expensive ones. Now my friends and I can all start out as beginners and possibly level up, but this seems sturdy enough to last through intermediate.
customer_reviews.author: Phaedrus

customer_reviews.title: Great balancing tool. Easy to move around and put away when not using
customer_reviews.text: Much easier than the years old bongo board. It’s getting back my balance that I lost from a brain tumor and working toward the harder model. Sent one to a friend in Colorado and loves it for his ski trying exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Liz prewitt

customer_reviews.title: It is dangerous so I don't recommend it for out of shape folks with poor balance
customer_reviews.text: I am a 42 year old lawyer and have this in my office and use it daily. It is dangerous so I don't recommend it for out of shape folks with poor balance. I put it on a rug in front of a solid buffet table and hold the table to get on. My husband fell pretty hard using it so I don't recommend it if you are not cautious. A great balance activity if you can concentrate. I use it about 15-30 minutes a day off and on when I need a break.
customer_reviews.author: KassMcQ

customer_reviews.title: Medicore Balance Board - Look for another model
customer_reviews.text: While the design does have a few inherent flaws, the board nonetheless works for balance training. The largest flaw is that the rolling pin underneath is not secured tightly in a grove, which leads to a back-and-forth wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Marciniak

customer_reviews.title: ... it as a Christmas gift and was a little disappointed because the thing the board rolls on just looks ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well for beginner but I bought it as a Christmas gift and was a little disappointed because the thing the board rolls on just looks cheap.... and a sticker goes on the sides & it already started peeling.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: crapp wood quality , the roller is a disc that you assemble
customer_reviews.text: Worse than the cheapest powdered IKEA powdered wood, appallingly misleading pictures. spend a few bucks extra and get something from other manufacturers. thank you amazon for your return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Anil Shankar

customer_reviews.title: my boys love this
customer_reviews.text: all 3 of my boys love this and are a different levels of comfort on it. We use a thin yoga mat under it so it does not scratch the floor but still rolls well.
customer_reviews.author: Paige D

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: After using a friends balance board, i had to get one for myself, but I wasn't ready to spend 150$ on a board that i knew nothing about. Did some digging around and found this board for 35$ and couldn't be happier with my purchase. The roller underneath comes disassembled with instructions of how to put it together, which i thought was pretty neat. These are great for working on your balance and taking your mind off the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its fun and a good introduction for balance board
customer_reviews.text: Made of compressed wood. Its fun and a good introduction for balance board. Reasonable price if you don't want to spend a large amount of $. My kids enjoy it. It has become a challenge for them to see how long they can stay on it. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Necochea

customer_reviews.title: Best model for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and go with this model/product. Ive used Indo boards before and this is just as good. The board slides on the roller a little when it's new but breaks in quick. You can even sand down the track a little to make it grip more right away. Also. Add grip tape to the top of you want to go on with socks.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Downs

customer_reviews.title: Fun workout
customer_reviews.text: I bought the balance board to help improve my skills on the ski slopes. It is made in USA and was very easy to assemble. I started out on carpet standing next to a car to catch myself. After a little while, my balance improved so that I now am on concrete. It is a lot of fun and is a good non-impact workout. My only gripe is the stickers on the wheels aren't sticking very well, but that doesn't matter to me. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toy and Workout in One!
customer_reviews.text: So fun to challenge yourself and get stronger! I love this board and feel awesome when I hit the sweet spot and can hold it steady for a few seconds. Took this to work, and everyone loves to drop by and take a turn. It has held up some pretty big bodies and it still working great. Solid construction, you just have to tighten the bolts on the "roller" piece every now and then. This is a toy and exercise equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Alize

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to improve our balance because we are going to Hawaii and wanted to prepare for surfing. Our kids (every age) as well as all of their friends have not gotten off of it! Very safe, it mostly stays in place, the grips for your feet are good, and the board has a stop so it will only roll so far. Even our 1st grader can do it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy thiis one!
customer_reviews.text: I have another one in my other house that is 200% better. Wood that slides on the roller is slightly warped so it scrapes. Much better products out there!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun training board - Not a toy for children
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid balance trainer. It is longer than most of the other similar ones , which is why I chose it. Check the age guidelines! This is not for kiddies. It is pretty challenging - and I am an athletic adult. Starting on a carpeted flooring is a must for most people (I would guess).
customer_reviews.author: Tara Brandt

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good board for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This board is not good for beginners. The wheel they give you is a good 3 or 4 inches big, which makes this board very hard to balance on. If they would include smaller wheels that worked you up to the bigger ones, this would be 5 star. But the first time I used it, launched myself into the air and landed pretty good on the living room floor.
customer_reviews.author: WilsonHouse

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner board
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad. It has a rail in the center forcing the board down a particular path matched on the roller. Most likely there to enhance the boards durability. However, not as functional as other boards I've tried. Yet, still great especially for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST. PLAIN. FUN.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old who likes to surf and loves to ‘balance’ on things. Really focuses that ‘extra’ energy and is quiet (live in condo complex above neighbors who like to complain about noise). Keep in living room and every guest wants to try t out. Addictive. Easy to assemble, like that it is channeled so board doesn’t slide off the roller.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great board!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 yr old grandson and he loves it! Made well! I did not want to spend a hundred dollars on one and this one serves the purpose! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Paulette J Heber

customer_reviews.title: The top is a big sticker
customer_reviews.text: The top and the wheel sides are just stickers that are peeling up after a few days. We will probably just rip it off and put our own grip tape on the board. Or maybe paint our own design on it. The overall wood structure seems good though.
customer_reviews.author: ewhite

customer_reviews.title: This got some negative reviews but it is a HUGE ...
customer_reviews.text: This got some negative reviews but it is a HUGE hit in our house! We got it for my husband (more for the kids :) ) and everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 day
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this board. After less than a full day of use, the beam on the bottom of the board that keeps it in the tracks of the roller popped off and rendered this thing useless (you can use it without the beam, but it slides right off the roller and makes it much easier to injure yourself on). Spend the extra $50 for a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Norfleet

customer_reviews.title: A great way to improve balance and coordination
customer_reviews.text: A great way to improve balance and coordination. Beginners need to hang on to a counter or chair. The one I used when I was a kid had a smaller diameter and didn't have a tendency to shoot you across the room if you lost your focus. :D These Carrom balance boards have a problem with friction between the center guide board and the slot, turn just a bit off perfect center and it is like putting on the brakes. Overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gary Cotterill

customer_reviews.title: A lot harder than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: A lot harder than it looks. I bought this board for my son to work on his balance for karate and skateboarding and for myself to work on my balance and core. It is a lot harder to balance than you would think. The only reason I am knocking a star off is that the wheel at the bottom isn't solid wood as I thought, it is multple wheels comprised of pressed wood. If I could have purchased all over again, I think I'd have gone with a balance ball.
customer_reviews.author: NLA

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have had other name brands more sturdy, but its fine for the cost
customer_reviews.author: Yoga 101

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor toy
customer_reviews.text: I got four of these for Christmas and they were a hit! My son, 8, loves it as does his cousin, 9. The oldest cousin, 12 seemed to like it as well and my daughter, 4, enjoys riding on it while we hold her hands. One more reason to play outside! It was easy to put together and it is easy to store without taking up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Jen A

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the cost. The wooden board tends to slip on the wooden wheel, so I added grip tape on the board to prevent this. Made a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Stolz

customer_reviews.title: Thick, sturdy, advanced!
customer_reviews.text: The board itself is fantastic. Thick and sturdy. I wouldn't recommend it for beginners. Its a little more advanced. Has grips on the board to prevent slips.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Decker

customer_reviews.title: Take a Quick Break at Work
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Saw the natural version (no stickers, graphics, or paint) of this and knew it was a good fit for the office. Now I can take a quick break from sitting and use it to build up some core strength.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as I remember
customer_reviews.text: In about 1975, I had a "Bongo Board" and I bought this with the good old Bongo Board in mind.. I was a little worried because the roller looks like it's in several pieces bolted together, but this thing is just as rugged as what I remember the other one to have been. It's fun to play with, although at 44 years old, I'm pretty sure I'm going to kill myself on this.. I hope my 12 year old gets on it - It's great for balance.
customer_reviews.author: 172pilot

customer_reviews.title: The four wooden circles where the board balances were too ...
customer_reviews.text: The four wooden circles where the board balances were too thick so you couldn’t screw on the last nut.
customer_reviews.author: Casey G.

customer_reviews.title: A little rickety at the base. You have to ...
customer_reviews.text: A little rickety at the base. You have to assemble the "wheel" with several square pieces. My daughter still enjoys balancing on it while doing her homework in her room.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: as a family toy great
customer_reviews.text: This was the hit gift for Christmas. All the kids and adults loved trying it. It was the least expensive I could find. It is good quality. If you are concerned about safety it is relatively safe. Just use it on carpet and clear the immediate area. No real falls yet but tons of fun
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got one each for 10 and 14 yr old grandsons. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Doodles

customer_reviews.title: Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: This board is perfectly priced and is so much fun. My boys use it often (husband and kids).
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9-year old nephew for Christmas and it lasted less than two weeks before the board snapped in half!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Ratkin

customer_reviews.title: Balancing act
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift, very well made and an excellent value, works perfectly, great for balance and core strength and thigh workout. Fun for the whole family to try.
customer_reviews.author: V A S

customer_reviews.title: balance board
customer_reviews.text: Great product and is designed for balance and does provide a good way to work on balance.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia F.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing - bolt is too short by half inch for the wheel assembly and will have to buy a bolt to make it work
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo K

customer_reviews.title: The little circle thing you balance on could be made better. It definitely needs to be sanded down and ...
customer_reviews.text: The board is well made. The little circle thing you balance on could be made better. It definitely needs to be sanded down and stained.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: I love it. So much fun to use. It has a small board in the center that means the roller at the bottom always stays on track and it has blocks on the end that keep the board from sliding out from under you.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Works just as good as any other balance board I used before. Very simple instructions to follow to assemble the wheel. Seems very basic but it works perfectly for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Nice board. It broke in a couple months of daily use... I weigh 240lbs... on bright side. Happy to replace at no cost to me.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mascaro

customer_reviews.title: Carrom Balance Board
customer_reviews.text: Really really fun to balance on and a good core workout. Fit and finish could be a little nicer but for the price I am pleased. The guide on the bottom rubs a bit on the sides of the wheel but it doesn't really effect its functionality. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: B. Snell

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: My high-energy 7.5 yr old took right to it! Mom and dad can do it too :) I have fond memories of a Carrom Game Board when I was a kid so I was happy to see this company is still making quality fun in the USA. Great products.
customer_reviews.author: astrustyas

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite Christmas gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 32-year-old son for Christmas. He absolutely loves it and says it is his favorite gift this year. Everything was exactly as described and easy to put together. It is sturdy and made to last. Would not hesitate to recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Warner

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great balance board. My Fiance and I enjoy it and it is helping her balance out for longboarding big time. I have noticed some splinters, but they stop after it wears in. Should the roller end up breaking, I will just buy some PVC pipe and make some adjustments. I thoroughly enjoy this board and the price is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: So unbelievably cheap -- just a box of wooden blocks ...
customer_reviews.text: So unbelievably cheap -- just a box of wooden blocks and a silly bar that is supposed to hold it all together. Misleading; I can't believe I was so duped.
customer_reviews.author: Milwaukee Montessori

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to use this balance board since my old roommate had an indo board that I loved. It broke within a month of having it and I could find no way to receive a refund :( I would spend the extra money and get a better one :(
customer_reviews.author: Heather Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Good company to deal with
customer_reviews.text: Everybody enjoys this balance board made well would recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our kids love this and so do we
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love this and so do we! I was skeptical when seeing assembling the "wheel base" but this is great!
customer_reviews.author: Positive Vibes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my four year old grandchild. We all could play on it
customer_reviews.author: M. Braun

customer_reviews.title: This board is fantastic! Anyone up to 200 pounds can use it
customer_reviews.text: This board is fantastic! Anyone up to 200 pounds can use it. You start off with one foot at the end of each side of the board and then you lean side to side and roll on the board.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun, great for balance and leg work
customer_reviews.text: Loads of fun, great for balance and leg work. I use it on the carpet later, when more competent I will try it on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: B.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great balance board.  Solid and well made.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I've made my own before and they never quite work perfectly. This does. I use it for a lot of cool stuff in my workout and stabilization exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey G.

customer_reviews.title: wobbly man learns stability
customer_reviews.text: great deal. wanted a balance board and they are so flippin much money. learned to use this and what a great value. holds 300 pounds and very stable. best value and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brent Cole

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a present for my husband, ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my husband, unfortunately he opened it two months after I purchased it and even though he has not had it five minutes we cannot return it. There are splinters coming off every piece of wood. This is a cheap copy of nicer boards. Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: aleicia

customer_reviews.title: You should by this
customer_reviews.text: This thing has lasted four years great foot grip and super easy to build!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R

customer_reviews.title: I think others are better, but for the price it is a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Son likes it OK. I think others are better, but for the price it is a good balance board to start out on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have had other bongo boards and this one is a bit shotty. Still does the work though.
customer_reviews.author: MichLal

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercise and to strengthen ankles
customer_reviews.text: Peter rail at the bottom keeps the roller from sliding out of line. Great touch over the one I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Dwaine Bufford

customer_reviews.title: Pretty poor product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty poor product.. The nut didn't fit onto the bolt for the wheel so I had to go to a hardware store and buy a new nut. Also, the board had wood on the edges that was fraying, so I was forced to sand it down to prevent wood chips from getting everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Connor J.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality however the wood tends to scrape a little bit but it's still really great.
customer_reviews.author: Collectre

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife for Christmas and she loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Every skateboarder needs this
customer_reviews.text: I forgot how fun these were and it’s been great for balance as well as gaining my core strength it a must have for any skateboarder
customer_reviews.author: Travis Storer

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Is challenging but comfortable. Simple wooden materials easy to put together and store. Just be careful, it is a tool to improve balance so will shoot you off. Be responsible user and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for improving your balance. Definitely start off using it on a carpeted area before on a hard surface. Until you get used it, you can seriously hurt yourself falling off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Leeloo

customer_reviews.title: got this for my sons dorm room
customer_reviews.text: all the guys like to try it when they visit. My son was also happy with it. Thought the part underneath was one large roller, but it is actu. Works well, but could be a problems if the bolts become loose.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Fun and balance go so well!
customer_reviews.text: Most fun workout. I love using it while on the phone or watching tv briefly. Keeps your legs moving, mind sharp and is downright fun
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Poor imitation of what a balance board should be
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Poor imitation of what a balance board should be. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Seems overpriced for the quality of the product... Which isn't bad but for the price I would expect higher quality.... @ 30 dollars I would give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: roaming green turtle

customer_reviews.title: Not Functional
customer_reviews.text: Returning! Poor design. Looks nice, but, as someone said, the board doesn't roll smoothly once assembled. You shift your weight, roll a bit and it sticks again... Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: T.S.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this one
customer_reviews.text: This is a rip off ... the flat piece binds in the way they set up the wheel part. Don't buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use it to work on balance.
customer_reviews.text: Use it to work on balance. For the price it does well although I have never tried more expensive boards
customer_reviews.author: kookinginthekitchen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love practicing my balance while watching tv, or a quick moment before bed.
customer_reviews.author: randi

product_meta.title: Carrom Balance Board
product_meta.description: The Balance Board is a valuable conditioning tool for every athlete or exercise junky, especially for the skiing or skateboarding enthusiast. Not an athlete or exercise junky? Your kids will enjoy watching you try to stay on this thing. You will enjoy watching your kids learn balance and coordination they didn't inherit from you. It can be used in a standing, kneeling or sitting position. Fine tune your balance and coordination all while having quality family fun. Consumers Reports thinks it's pretty cool.
feature_bullets: Cool new graphics with anti-skid strips for better control
This product is not a toy It is not intended for use by children under 13 years old

specifications.Manufacturer: Merdel Game Manufacturing d.b.a. Carrom Company
